About

Altus is a Junior web developer, he moved to Brazil in 2019 and is currently staying in Holambra - SP with his wife with and their adopted cat.

Altus has completed a web development bootcamp on Udemy, which fueled his desire to become a web developer. He is always learning and is always very curious.

When not coding Altus enjoys Gaming, fishing and playing with his cat.
